main event: A brilliant pinpoint of light was observed fading in and out, moving erratically for about 5 minutes in Columbus, Georgia on August 22, 1954.
interesting points: The light moved in an erratic pattern with no sound associated., It was only observed for a duration of 5 minutes., The object was possibly identified as a balloon., Reported by military personnel stationed at Lawson AFB., The sighting occurred at 01:32 AM Zulu time.
